name: previewjs
description: Get instant previews of your UI components, directly in your IDE

previewjs.livePreview.title: Live Preview
previewjs.livePreview.description: Update previews instantly, without waiting for saving. Reload required.

previewjs.codelens.title: CodeLens
previewjs.codelens.description: Show a link to open Preview.js above each detected component. Reload required.

keybindings.when: editorLangId == javascript || editorLangId == javascriptreact || editorLangId == jsx || editorLangId == typescriptreact || editorLangId == vue

editor/title.when: editorLangId == javascript || editorLangId == javascriptreact || editorLangId == jsx || editorLangId == typescriptreact || editorLangId == vue

scripts.build: rimraf dist previewjs-1.16.1.vsix && tsc && node esbuild.js && shx cp -rL ../../loader/src/release/node_modules dist/node_modules
scripts.prod: cross-env PREVIEWJS_DEV=0 pnpm vsce package --no-dependencies && pnpm dev:install
scripts.dev: cross-env PREVIEWJS_DEV=1 pnpm vsce package --no-dependencies && pnpm dev:install
